attributes.action: no to vat on the hot sausage roll & pasty
attributes.additional_details:
A heated row has broken out over the humble sausage roll: bakeries and supermarkets were protesting over changes to VAT rules that will vary the levy according to the temperature of freshly baked products sold. Is thia what our country has come down too putting tax on a hot sausage roll,ridiculous

http://www.guardian.co.uk/uk/2012/mar/22/budget-2012-sausage-roll-vat-row-unsavoury?newsfeed=true
